title: Reasons for Calling or Messaging Failures
answer:
**Reasons for Calling or Messaging Failures**

This document provides reasons for such problems as your phone cannot be connected when someone calls you, calls are interrupted, messages are delayed or fail to be received. 

**[You may be in a signal blind area.]**

Your phone may fail to be connected or calls may be interrupted if you are in a signal blind area, such as a suburb area between mountains or fields without network communication equipment or an urban area where signals are blocked by obstacles. 

**[The signal may be interrupted.]**

During important exams, anti-cheating jammers may be enabled around the exam rooms. Keep away from the jammers or wait until the exam ends. 

**[You may be moving from one place to another.]**

If you are switching from one service cell to another during a call, your voice channel needs to be switched to the new cell. If the new cell is busy and there is no channel to be assigned, the call will be interrupted. 

**[You may be experiencing a network rush hour or error.]**

If you cannot make calls in a busy commercial district, you may be experiencing a network rush hour or network error. Wait for a while and try again. 

**[The SIM card may not be properly connected to your phone.]**

Check whether the SIM card is clean. If not, clean the SIM card and properly install it.
keywords: Reasons for Calling or Messaging Failures
